alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL FLAGLER AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Satsuma, or near Pomona Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Pomona Park, East Palatka, San Mateo, Satsuma, Welaka, and Lake Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam
